opinion.caption: COMMISSIONER OF HEALTH
opinion.opinion_text: OPINION — AG — **** COUNTY HEALTH DEPARTMENT — TRAVEL EXPENSES **** AN EMPLOYEE OF A COUNTY HEALTH DEPARTMENT IS ENTITLED TO BE REIMBURSED FOR TRAVEL EXPENSES. CITE: 63 O.S. 1968 Supp., 1-201 [63-1-201], 63 O.S. 1968 Supp., 1-202 [63-1-202],
